name: HistoryOfHipFractureInParent
title: History of hip fracture in parent
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a family history of fracture in a parent.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Assessment, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a patient has a family history of fracture in a parent. This is a grouping of SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
